org.arl.fjage.shell

Interface ScriptEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroovyScriptEngine

    public interface ScriptEngine
    An interface representing a scripting engine.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • exec

        boolean exec(java.lang.String cmd,
             Shell out)
        Execute a command. The method does not wait for execution to be completed but returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        cmd - command to execute.
        out - output stream (null to suppress output).
        Returns:
        true if accepted for execution, false if busy.

      • exec

        boolean exec(java.io.File script,
             Shell out)
        Execute a script file. The method does not wait for execution to be completed but returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        script - script file to execute.
        out - output stream (null to suppress output).
        Returns:
        true if accepted for execution, false if busy.

      • exec

        boolean exec(java.io.File script,
             java.util.List<java.lang.String> args,
             Shell out)
        Execute a script file. The method does not wait for execution to be completed but returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        script - script file to execute.
        args - arguments to pass to script.
        out - output stream (null to suppress output).
        Returns:
        true if accepted for execution, false if busy.

      • exec

        boolean exec(java.lang.Class<?> script,
             Shell out)
        Execute a precompiled script. The method does not wait for execution to be completed but returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        script - script class to execute.
        out - output stream (null to suppress output).
        Returns:
        true if accepted for execution, false if busy or unable to instantiate class.

      • exec

        boolean exec(java.lang.Class<?> script,
             java.util.List<java.lang.String> args,
             Shell out)
        Execute a precomplied script. The method does not wait for execution to be completed but returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        script - script class to execute.
        args - arguments to pass to script.
        out - output stream (null to suppress output).
        Returns:
        true if accepted for execution, false if busy or unable to instantiate class.

      • exec

        boolean exec(java.io.Reader reader,
             java.lang.String name,
             Shell out)
        Execute a script from a reader. The method does not wait for execution to be completed but returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        reader - reader to read script from.
        name - reader name for logging.
        out - output stream (null to suppress output).
        Returns:
        true if accepted for execution, false if busy.

      • exec

        boolean exec(java.io.Reader reader,
             java.lang.String name,
             java.util.List<java.lang.String> args,
             Shell out)
        Execute a script from a reader. The method does not wait for execution to be completed but returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        reader - reader to read script from.
        name - reader name for logging.
        args - arguments to pass to script.
        out - output stream (null to suppress output).
        Returns:
        true if accepted for execution, false if busy.
